import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import React from "react"; const Book = ( {book}) => { return (
{book.title}
{ book.salePrice ? (<> ${book.originalPrice.toFixed(2)} ${book.salePrice.toFixed(2)} ): ( <>$ {book.originalPrice} ) }
) } export default Book
